data.title: Saint Louis Blues
data.meta_description: Saint Louis Blues is a partner of Explore St Louis. Contact Travel and tourism ranks among the top 7 industries in St. Louis City and County.
data.text:
TripAdvisor Rating:

365 Reviews | Write a Review

NO LEGROOM

Reviewed By Shelley A

Absolutely NO legroom and staff were VERY rude. Would not recommend for anyone with arthritis or mobility issues. If you can’t sit with your legs drawn up to your chest I would find another venue.

Full Review

Great Show, Very Uncomfortable Seats

Reviewed By PowerTrippersTravel

In our frequent travels, we’ve sat in many, many stadium seats. While the seats at the Enterprise Center were nicely padded, they were ridiculously small. Even my petite wife had no leg room. I’m...

Full Review

Fantastic Arena

Reviewed By ceetee00

The arena is downtown, and parking is not cheap ($30). A short walk to the arena with plenty of traffic control (nice cops). The arena is modern, it has plenty of concession stands, beer stands (Bud...

Full Review
